headline: 2025-10-29 — Authors of the arXiv paper 'The power interactions of any component in electric energy systems...' introduce an interaction variable that represents instantaneous active power measured in watts (W) and generalized reactive power measured in volt‑ampere reactive (VAR) as the unified basis for multi‑layered distributed output feedback control.

2025-10-28 — The same arXiv authors specify that the higher layer design issues intermediate reactive‑power control commands (units: VAR) to the lower‑layer physical model as a concrete control signal for distributed stabilization.
2025-10-30 — The arXiv paper demonstrates the proposed control architecture on 1 RLC circuit with a controllable voltage source (1 circuit used as the illustrative physical testbed).

2025-10-27 — The authors of the correction note publicly correct 1 serious mistake and address multiple additional inaccuracies (1 major mistake + several inaccuracies) in 'Consensus and cooperation in networked multi‑agent systems' (Olfati‑Saber, Fax, Murray, Proc. IEEE 2007).
